definitions.definition: A small, spineless cactus ( Lophophora williamsii ) found from southwest United States to central Mexico that produces buttonlike tubercles that can be chewed for their psychedelic effect, primarily from the drug mescaline .
A mescal button produced by the plant.

main_definition: A small, spineless cactus ( Lophophora williamsii ) found from southwest United States to central Mexico that produces buttonlike tubercles that can be chewed for their psychedelic effect, primarily from the drug mescaline .
secondary_definitions: A mescal button produced by the plant.
